name: Darling...
greetingText: Thank you for existing in my Timeline as well as my Lifeline!!!
wishText: May wishes of every divine beings always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Wish you a many many more happiest returns of the day Sunshine...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
